title: Deck of dungeons
data:
{{Obsolete}} {{item |itemtype=Miscellaneous item |name=deck of dungeons |cost=500 |weight=5 }} {{flavour|A deck of magical cards which deal with shaping the dungeon.}} The '''deck of dungeons''' selects its cards only from its own [[Decks#Archetype_decks|archetype deck]], and is considered a "pure" deck. The possible cards across versions in this deck are shown in the table below. {| class="prettytable" !pre-[[0.15]] |---- !style="text-align:left;vertical-align:top;font-weight:normal"| [[Dowsing card|Dowsing]]
[[Minefield card|the Minefield]]
[[Trowel card|the Trowel]]
[[Vitrification card|Vitrification]]
[[Water card|Water]] |---- |} ==History== The deck of dungeons, and all its cards except [[Dowsing card|Dowsing]], were removed in [[0.15]]. ==See also== *[[Cards]] *[[Decks]] [[Category:Deck]]
